name: Space-arang - Only One
description:
Space-arang is my submission for the GMTK Game Jam.

You have Only One projectile available at a time and will have to wait for it to return to you for you to use it again.

There is also Only One screen.

There are, however, 4 enemy types and and endless number of waves.

Arrow Keys to move.

X to shoot.

Z to activate the invincibility cheat.
